channel.title: We Love Greeny fund
channel.description:
We Love Greeny fund
[hr] [center][size=20pt][b]The We Love Greeny fund[/b][/size][/center]
I have an idea.
Since we all love greeny so incredibly much, let's force him to make a a paypal account. On christmas day, everyone who loves Greeny should donate $5 to it.
After that, 25% of the earnings should be donated to some childrens camp in Afghanistan.
